### Request for Proposal: Digital Media Buying Services
#### Reference Number: cb-416-24419666, Solicitation Number: CMIP21202304
#### Amendment Number: 4
#### Tender Closing Date: **December 7, 2023 @ 1:00 PM**
#### Expected Contract Start Date: **February 26, 2024**

The Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21 invites proposals from qualified Proponents to provide strategic digital media planning and buying services for a period of two years, from **2024 to 2026**. The successful Proponent will be responsible for developing and implementing a comprehensive digital media strategy to promote tourism in Nova Scotia.

**Terms of Reference:**
The scope of work includes:

* Strategic digital media planning and buying services
* Media placement and fulfillment
* Advertising and media services in Canada and Nova Scotia
* Tourism marketing and promotion

**Eligibility:**
Proponents must have experience working with tourism clients, preferably in the Nova Scotia market. Bidders must submit a proposal outlining their experience, methodology, and proposed approach to achieving the desired outcomes.

**Submission Requirements:**
Proposals must be submitted electronically by the closing deadline. The evaluation criteria for the proposals will include:

* Highest Technical Merit within a stipulated maximum budget
* Proponent's experience and track record
* Methodology and approach
* Ability to meet the client's requirements

**Important Documents:**
The full request for proposal is available for download from the Canada Buys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23333/rfp-digital-media-buying-services-2024-2026.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23333/rfp-digital-media-buying-services-2024-2026.pdf)

Please note that there are no limited tendering reasons.

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Ashley MacPherson, procurement officer, at [procurement@pier21.ca](mailto:procurement@pier21.ca) or (902) 425-7770.
